titleStmt.title: The passionate pilgrime. By W. Shakespeare
titleStmt.author: Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by T. Judson] for W. Iaggard, and are to be sold by W. Leake, at the Greyhound in Paules Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: A pirated miscellany, mostly not by Shakespeare.
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A"; the last leaf is blank.
"Sonnets to sundry notes of musicke" has separate dated title page; register is continuous.
Leaves A1-D4 are printed on rectos only.
In this edition, A5r text begins "Did not"; C5r line 1 has "alacke"; D3r line 1 has "to her will".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
